llm.feedback:
Up | 3–6 months | Deregulation/Policy Reversal regime shift toward deregulation lifting investment appetite and accelerating capital reallocation to domestic suppliers via subsidies monetized as equity stakes | Watch Intel CHIPS governance developments and magnitude of regulatory reforms and CRA signals | 60% (9W8ZUIBDY)(5M9M1KACF)

Up | 0–3 months | Adyen’s H1 2025 momentum signals resilience of embedded-finance/payments ecosystems to tariff shocks enabling cross-border pricing power | Watch Adyen geographic expansion and cross-border settlement metrics | 60% (QRX2HD4X0)

Down | 3–6 months | Geopolitics shock crystallizes intensified cross-border protectionism and durable semiconductor governance decisions raising tariff pass-through, compressing margins for import-reliant sectors and re-pricing cross-border capital toward domestic channels | Watch for Japan’s anti-dumping signal (2SJORBV6H) and broader tariff developments (RHFWI02JT) | 40% (2SJORBV6H)(RHFWI02JT)

Down | 0–3 weeks | Near-term tariff actions and exemptions risk with India’s 50% tariffs around Aug 27 and de minimis expiry on Aug 28 raising duties and pressuring margins | Watch timing and outcomes of India tariffs (DGG6HXUFZ), EU MFN framework around Sept 1 (RHFWI02JT), de minimis expiry (VCZKKPORO), and the furniture tariff-investigation window (9BA7355CV) | 35% (DGG6HXUFZ)(RHFWI02JT)(VCZKKPORO)(9BA7355CV)
